cards.title: BACCALÀ Premiere Issue
cards.content: Fall/Winter 2017 featuring Aomi Muyock shot by Alice Rosati . Andrew Durham on set with Sofia Coppola . Studio Visit with Brian Lotti . Artist Portraits by Damon Way . Polaroids by Scott A. Sant’Angelo . Yeah Sure Real Mature by Danny Sangra . It’s Something Personal by Alessandro Casagrande . Stories We Build, Stories We Tell by Vince Aung . Stuff in Storage with Tony Arcabascio .  Yellow Days by Jasmine Deporta . Baccalà Mare Nostrum Recipe by Massimo Bottura

cards.title: From Sex Object to Gritty Woman: The Evolution of Women in Stock Photos
cards.content: Generic images used in ads, billboards, magazines and blogs hold up a mirror to culture at a particular moment in time. But can they also subtly influence it?
